title: Episode #3: Joel Brenner on Amerca the Vulnerable
itunes:title: Episode #3: Joel Brenner on Amerca the Vulnerable
itunes:subtitle: Former NSA General Counsel Joel Brenner discusses his book, America the Vulnerable: Inside the New Threat Matrix of Digital Espionage, Crime, and Warfare.
description:
Former NSA General Counsel Joel Brenner discusses his book, America the Vulnerable: Inside the New Threat Matrix of Digital Espionage, Crime, and Warfare.
